options.content:
# Delegate to us

You can support further development by delegating to our mainnet indexer: **stake-machine.eth** (**[0x1692a8710dcf0dce24bd34c028479176b97ee9ef](https://thegraph.com/explorer/profile/0x1692a8710dcf0dce24bd34c028479176b97ee9ef?view=Indexing&chain=mainnet)**) 

Our arbitrum indexer: (**[0xe0ceec6daa59cc951f3f71d6fc4221e55ef6c386](https://thegraph.com/explorer/profile/0xe0ceec6daa59cc951f3f71d6fc4221e55ef6c386?view=Indexing&chain=arbitrum-one)**)

Also you can take a look at our [Indexer Dashboard](https://thegraph.stake-machine.com/d/indexers/thegraph-indexers?orgId=1&refresh=1m&var-indexer=0x1692a8710dcf0dce24bd34c028479176b97ee9ef)
